ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ROK city
ygData.msgSnippet: I was fighting at the giant wizzy spires last night and I was getting faction messages on a regular basis...even when we weren t fighting anything.  Down with
ygData.messageBody:
I was fighting at the giant wizzy spires last night and I was getting
faction messages on a regular basis...even when we weren't fighting
anything. Down with Mayong and his residents. Pretty funny actually. I
guess this is a known bug. We chalked it up to roleplaying...we decided we
must have been fighting on the graves of some Mayong residents.

Ruldaas Riverdance


>From: "Gordon Hughes" <ghughes@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] ROK city
>Date: Mon, 8 May 2000 16:48:29 -0400
>
>That's what I was finding, too. If I got anywhere near a Drachnid without
>it actually aggro'ing on me or me taking a swipe at it, sooner or later I'd
>get a bad faction message. Mayong really loves me now. ;)
>
>
>---------------------------
>We were getting them near the Sarnak fortress in Lake of Ill Omen.
>We petitioned, and the guide said if a sarnak even looked at you, you
>got on its aggro list -- and thus got faction hits
>
